name: nina-mueller-wordpress
description: The final project of Content Management Systeme by @arazdev and @motcodes

scripts.buildall: rsync -rvz --progress ./src/php/ ./public/wp-content/themes/alex-mayer-theme --delete && sass ./src/styles/index.scss ./public/wp-content/themes/alex-mayer-theme/style.css && esbuild ./src/js/index.js --bundle --outfile=./public/wp-content/themes/alex-mayer-theme/js/script.js && rsync -vaE --progress ./src/images/ ./public/wp-content/themes/alex-mayer-theme/images && rsync -vaE --progress ./src/favicons/ ./public/wp-content/themes/alex-mayer-theme/favicons && rsync -vaE --progress ./src/fonts/ ./public/wp-content/themes/alex-mayer-theme/fonts && rsync -vaE --progress ./src/files/ ./public/wp-content/themes/alex-mayer-theme

author: @arazdev & @motcodes
